title: The Rec Room
text:
The Rec Room is a Canadian chain of entertainment restaurants owned by <a href="Cineplex%20Entertainment">Cineplex Entertainment</a>. It first opened in <a href="Edmonton">Edmonton</a> in 2016 and its locations feature entertainment and recreational attractions such as an <a href="Amusement%20arcade">arcade</a>, <a href="driving%20simulator">driving simulator</a>s; recreational games such as <a href="darts">darts</a>, <a href="bowling">bowling</a>, <a href="archery">archery</a>, and <a href="virtual%20reality">virtual reality</a>; as well as restaurants and bars, and an <a href="auditorium">auditorium</a> with a cinema-style screen, which can be used for concerts and other live events.
History.
In January 2015, <a href="Cineplex%20Entertainment">Cineplex Entertainment</a> announced the establishment of The Rec Room as a brand-new concept, with initial locations set for <a href="Calgary">Calgary</a>'s <a href="Deerfoot%20City">Deerfoot City</a>, <a href="South%20Edmonton%20Common">South Edmonton Common</a>, and <a href="Roundhouse%20Park">Roundhouse Park</a> in <a href="Toronto">Toronto</a>. Cineplex CEO <a href="Ellis%20Jacob">Ellis Jacob</a> explained that the chain was meant to help the company diversify beyond its core <a href="Movie%20theater">cinema</a> business in the wake of the growing <a href="Streaming%20media">streaming</a> industry.
The first location opened in South Edmonton Common in 2016. A second location at Roundhouse Park opened in June 2017, along with a second Edmonton location at <a href="West%20Edmonton%20Mall">West Edmonton Mall</a>. 
Cineplex aimed to open 10-15 locations of The Rec Room nationally, ranging in size from 30,000 to 50,000 square feet. The company subsequently announced and opened other locations, including <a href="Masonville%20Place">Masonville Place</a> in <a href="London%2C%20Ontario">London</a>, <a href="Square%20One%20Shopping%20Centre">Square One Shopping Centre</a> in <a href="Mississauga">Mississauga</a> (replacing parts of the former <a href="Target%20Canada">Target Canada</a> store), <a href="Avalon%20Mall">Avalon Mall</a> in <a href="St.%20John%27s%2C%20Newfoundland%20and%20Labrador">St. Johns</a>, <a href="Tuxedo%2C%20Winnipeg">Seasons of Tuxedo</a> in <a href="Winnipeg">Winnipeg</a>, and <a href="Brentwood%20Town%20Centre">Brentwood Town Centre</a> in <a href="Burnaby">Burnaby</a>. In May 2019, Cineplex announced a second <a href="Vancouver">Vancouver</a>-area location on <a href="Granville%20Street">Granville Street</a> to open in 2021, featuring a rooftop patio.
The Toronto location features <a href="The%20Void%20%28virtual%20reality%29">The Void</a> virtual reality attraction. In July 2018, Cineplex announced that it would become the exclusive Canadian franchisee of The Void and add additional locations (such as the Mississauga and West Edmonton Mall locations).
